title: DC Islamabad tests positive for Covid-19
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP):Deputy Commissioner, Islamabad, Muhammad Hamza Shafqaat
on Sunday announced that he has tested positive for COVID-19.
The DC, in a tweet, wrote that his COVID-19 test came out positive.
He asked people to pray for him and also urged the masses to take the third wave of the pandemic seriously.
